meanings.definition: A flat surface in a kitchen or workshop on which work is done.
meanings.sent1: The chef rolled out the dough on the worktop.
meanings.sent2: She placed the ingredients on the worktop before starting to cook.
meanings.sent3: The worktop seemed to be tired of all the chopping and slicing.
meanings.sent4: The worktop witnessed countless culinary creations over the years.
meanings.sent5: The shiny worktop gleamed under the bright kitchen lights.

meanings.definition: The top surface of a counter or table used for working on.
meanings.sent1: The carpenter measured the wood on the worktop.
meanings.sent2: The students gathered around the worktop to collaborate on the project.
meanings.sent3: The worktop felt proud to support the busy activities in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed freely as she stood by the worktop.
meanings.sent5: The worktop bore the marks of creativity and hard work.
